# Global Mental Health Lab

<span style="color:green">
**Global Mental Health Lab is currently seeking research assistants for at least the full academic year**

## Lab Description:

See the Global Mental Health Lab [website](https://www.tc.columbia.edu/gmhlab/) for more information. Note that the Global Mental Health Lab requires a commitment of at least a full academic year.

## Contact Information:

If you are interested in applying for a RA position, please reach out to Dr. Bryan Cheng, our Director of Research.
